title: Jordan Klepper Fingers the Pulse - Arizona's Shady Recount | Michelle Zauner
itunes:title: Jordan Klepper Fingers the Pulse - Arizona's Shady Recount | Michelle Zauner
description:
Trevor highlights the GOP's ouster of Rep. Liz Cheney, Jordan Klepper examines a wild 2020 election audit in Arizona, and musician Michelle Zauner discusses her book "Crying in H Mart" and her album "Jubilee."

Donate at http://www.dailyshow.com/TherapyAid to support the Therapy Aid Coalition's efforts in providing training and compensation to volunteer psychotherapists so people impacted by national crises can receive quality mental health care and support.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
